item.title: investigationOS
item.description: investigationOS is a free, open-source Obsidian vault designed to provide a standardised, scalable framework for structuring, organising and managing source information uncovered by complex criminal investigations.

item.title: colophon
item.description: Production This website was authored in Obsidian, converted into a static single-page application using Quartz, and published via GitHub Pages.

item.title: computational linguistics
item.description: In the study of linguistics, computational linguistics is an interdisciplinary field that combines linguistics and computer science to analyse and understand human language using computational methods.
